channel.title: Offense Page
channel.description:
I'm bored so I decided to make an offense page thingy like RuneScape.
Right now all I'm doing is designing it, haven't started with the mySql yet.
Pics: (damn forgot to save as .png, the quality isn't good)
http://i44.tinypic.com/2zdt5dj.jpg http://i43.tinypic.com/jpa2y9.jpg
On top right it says player logged in and no name because I haven't made it get names from a database yet.
Any suggestions on design?
I'm using Dreamweaver, and I based the template off of a free one I downloaded.

item.title: Offense Page
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Counter4545, could you use this for Land of Tribes?

Read full topic

proof that it is yours.

item.title: Offense Page
item.dc:creator: @Girona Girona
item.description:
@Girona wrote:

[quote=“counter4545, post:4, topic:279435”][quote author=Girona link=topic=368764.msg2792084#msg2792084 date=1242842658]
I’ve seen this on several websites even including blogs, proof that it is yours.
[/quote]

I’m using Dreamweaver, and I based the template off of a free one I downloaded.

l2read

This looks pretty good.

For a bit of a suggestion; you should add a player holding a flag, and the flag is coloured to the amount of black marks/offences you have.

RuneScape has this for the number of black marks you have in your offence page.

sounds good[/quote]I can read, maybe you can’t.
I said…
I’ve seen THIS on other websites…

Read full topic

This looks pretty good.

For a bit of a suggestion; you should add a player holding a flag, and the flag is coloured to the amount of black marks/offences you have.

RuneScape has this for the number of black marks you have in your offence page.
